stories.text:
Hi,

I am looking for a technical cofounder with web development background to join me at Linkwork.

The base product is a Chrome extension for collaborative web browsing. Users can simply create a "room" and their browsing pages are shared live with others who join the room. Also Users can sync your Chrome tab to others in the room. At the end of the room, a report will be generated from the room transferred messages and emailed to users.

Try the extension from here: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/linkwork-collaborative-we/ecmleophaaakekpnibjhmcookecnemje

Take a look and if you are interested contact me at admin@joinlinkwork.com

stories.text: I'm contentedly employed full time and receive about 5 recruiter emails a week so am tempted to explore what's out there. Is it worth the time or would it just contribute further to my incipient misanthropy?
stories.title: Ask HN: Has interviewing changed or is it still a nightmare?
